name: intellij-idea-keybindings
description: Port of IntelliJ IDEA Keybindings, including for WebStorm, PyCharm, PHP Storm, etc.

keybindings.intellij: Show descriptions of error or warning at caret
Generate code... (Getters, Setters, Constructors, hashCode/equals, toString)
Decrease current selection to previous state

keybindings.when: notebookCellListFocused && notebookCellType == 'markup' || notebookCellListFocused && notebookMissingKernelExtension && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' || notebookCellListFocused && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' && notebookKernelCount > 0 || notebookCellListFocused && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' && notebookKernelSourceCount > 0

keybindings.intellij: Cut current line or selected block to clipboard
Cut current line or selected block to clipboard

keybindings.when: notebookCellListFocused && notebookCellType == 'markup' || notebookCellListFocused && notebookMissingKernelExtension && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' || notebookCellListFocused && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' && notebookKernelCount > 0 || notebookCellListFocused && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' && notebookKernelSourceCount > 0

keybindings.intellij: Increase Font Size in All Editors
Decrease Font Size in All Editors
Hide active or last active window (Sidebar)
Hide active or last active window (Problems)
Hide active or last active window (Debug Console)
Hide active or last active window (Terminal)
Maximize Tool Window (Problems, Output, Debug Console, Terminal)
Switch between tabs and tool window

keybindings.when: notebookCellListFocused && notebookMissingKernelExtension && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' || notebookCellListFocused && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' && notebookKernelCount > 0 || notebookCellListFocused && !notebookCellExecuting && notebookCellType == 'code' && notebookKernelSourceCount > 0

keybindings.intellij: Opens and focuses corresponding tool window (Terminal)
